scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-thirdparty
scripts.build-js: mkdir -p _site/assets/js && for entrypoint in src/*.js; do bundle_name=$(basename $entrypoint .js); browserify $entrypoint -o _site/assets/js/${bundle_name}.bundle.js; done
scripts.build-thirdparty: mkdir -p _site/assets && cp -R node_modules/bootstrap-sass/assets/{fonts,images,javascripts} _site/assets/ && cp -R node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js _site/assets/javascripts/ && jekyll build
scripts.test: echo No test specified, moving on.
